General.Name: Ha Do Group JSC
General.Description: Ha Do Group Joint Stock Company engages in the real estate, energy development, construction, and trading and service businesses in Vietnam. It is involved in the construction of civil, industrial, and transportation infrastructure, irrigation, hydropower, and M and E systems, as well as provides design and construction consultation services; development and investment in real estate properties, and investment consultation and distribution services for real estate projects; and investment, EPC, and operational services for hydropower plants. The company also invests in resorts, hotels, and restaurants; manages properties; and provides industrial production services. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
